attributes.action: All U.K. government decisions to be made only by duly elected U.K. officials.
attributes.additional_details: Whilst the experience of The House of Lords may be of value to the U.K. Government, their involvement should be purely advisory, and not cause any form of delay to decisions taken in The House Of Commons.
attributes.background: There is too much interference and delay, in the government of the United Kingdom, by those who have not been officially elected by the British people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you would like the House of Lords to be replaced with a publicly elected body, you could sign the petition below:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/170686
